declare @q nvarchar(4000), @key nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32), @baseCurrency varchar(32), @datetime0 datetime declare @user int, @admin bit, @language char(1), @sys varchar(32), @joinUnit bit, @joinDept bit, @r int, @count int select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @language = @@language, @sys = '@@sysDatabaseName', @datetime0 = getdate(), @key = '', @joinUnit = 0, @joinDept = 0 select @baseCurrency = rtrim(val) from options where rtrim(name) = 'm_ma_nt0'
-- Check &Checking;
&EndErrorMode;
-- Key if @admin = 0 begin exec AI_ERP$HRM$DeptRightFilter @user, @admin, 'e', 'e', @sys, @key output, @joinUnit output, @joinDept output select @key = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$GetCheckKey(@key) select @key = case when @key = '' then '' else ' where (' + @key + ')' end end
-- Gather create table #r(stt_rec char(13), tk_nh varchar(64), ma_nh char(32), ngan_hang nvarchar(128), loai_luong char(32), kieu_tinh char(32), ma_ngach varchar(33), ma_bac varchar(33), he_so_luong numeric(19, 4), tien_khoan numeric(19, 2), phu_cap numeric(19, 2), tro_cap numeric(19, 2), he_so1 numeric(19, 4), he_so2 numeric(19, 4), he_so3 numeric(19, 4), tien1 numeric(19, 4), tien2 numeric(19, 4), tien3 numeric(19, 4), ma_nt char(32), ma_ngach_ct varchar(33), ma_bac_ct varchar(33), he_so_luong_ct numeric(19, 4), tien_khoan_ct numeric(19, 4), ngay_hl_ct smalldatetime, hs_luong_bh numeric(19, 4), tien_bh numeric(19, 4), tien_cl numeric(19, 4), ngay_hl smalldatetime)
select @q = 'insert into #r select e.stt_rec, a.tk_nh, a.ma_nh, isnull(c.ten_nh, ''''), a.loai_luong, a.kieu_tinh, a.ma_ngach, a.ma_bac, a.he_so_luong, a.tien_khoan, a.phu_cap, a.tro_cap, he_so1, he_so2, he_so3,' select @q = @q + 'a.tien1, a.tien2, a.tien3, case when a.ma_nt <> '''' then a.ma_nt else ''' + @baseCurrency + ''' end, ' select @q = @q + 'a.ma_ngach_ct, a.ma_bac_ct, a.he_so_luong_ct, a.tien_khoan_ct, a.ngay_hl_ct, ' select @q = @q + 'a.hs_luong_bh, a.tien_bh, a.tien_cl, a.ngay_hl' select @q = @q + ' from @@table a join hrnv e on a.ma_nv = e.ma_nv left join hrdmnh c on a.ma_nh = c.ma_nh' + @key exec sp_executesql @q
select stt_rec, cast('' as char(3)) as stt_rec0, hs_luong_bh, tien_bh, tien_cl, ngay_hl, cast(0 as int) as stt into #d1 from #r where ngay_hl is not null select stt_rec, cast('' as char(3)) as stt_rec0, ma_ngach_ct, ma_bac_ct, he_so_luong_ct, tien_khoan_ct, ngay_hl_ct, cast(0 as int) as stt into #ct from #r where ngay_hl_ct is not null
if @type = '0' begin delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from hrttluong b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec) delete #d1 from #d1 a where exists(select 1 from hrttctluongbh b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl = b.ngay_hl) delete #ct from #ct a where exists(select 1 from hrttctluong b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl_ct = b.ngay_hl) end
select b.stt_rec, a.tk_nh, a.ma_nh, a.ngan_hang, a.loai_luong, a.kieu_tinh, a.ma_ngach, a.ma_bac, a.he_so_luong, a.tien_khoan, a.phu_cap, a.tro_cap, a.he_so1, a.he_so2, a.he_so3, a.tien1, a.tien2, a.tien3, a.ma_nt into #k from #r a join hrttluong b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec)
select b.stt_rec, b.stt_rec0, a.ma_ngach_ct, a.ma_bac_ct, a.he_so_luong_ct, a.tien_khoan_ct, a.ngay_hl_ct into #ct2 from #ct a join hrttctluong b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl_ct = b.ngay_hl delete #ct from #ct a where exists(select 1 from #ct2 b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl_ct = b.ngay_hl_ct)
select b.stt_rec, b.stt_rec0, a.hs_luong_bh, a.tien_bh, a.tien_cl, a.ngay_hl into #d2 from #d1 a join hrttctluongbh b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl = b.ngay_hl delete #d1 from #d1 a where exists(select 1 from #d2 b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl = b.ngay_hl) if @type = '1' &ListWhenBeforeImportUpdateLog; -- Insert @@inserting(master);
select @count = count(*) from #ct if @count > 0 begin create table #sttct(stt_rec char(13), stt_rec0 char(3)) create table #o1ct(stt_rec char(13), ngay_hl smalldatetime, stt int not null identity (1, 1))
insert into #sttct select b.stt_rec, max(b.stt_rec0) from #ct a join hrttctluong b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec group by b.stt_rec
insert into #o1ct(stt_rec, ngay_hl) select stt_rec, ngay_hl_ct from (select stt_rec, ngay_hl_ct from #ct union select distinct stt_rec, null from #ct) a order by stt_rec, ngay_hl_ct
select stt, stt_rec into #o2ct from #o1ct where ngay_hl is null
update #ct set stt = b.stt + cast(isnull(c.stt_rec0, 0) as int) from #ct a left join (select c.stt - d.stt as stt, c.stt_rec, c.ngay_hl from #o1ct c join #o2ct d on c.stt_rec = d.stt_rec) b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl_ct = b.ngay_hl left join #sttct c on a.stt_rec = c.stt_rec
-- Insert @@inserting(detail); end
select @count = count(*) from #d1 if @count > 0 begin create table #stt(stt_rec char(13), stt_rec0 char(3)) create table #o1(stt_rec char(13), ngay_hl smalldatetime, stt int not null identity (1, 1))
insert into #stt select b.stt_rec, max(b.stt_rec0) from #d1 a join hrttctluongbh b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec group by b.stt_rec
insert into #o1(stt_rec, ngay_hl) select stt_rec, ngay_hl from (select stt_rec, ngay_hl from #d1 union select distinct stt_rec, null from #d1) a order by stt_rec, ngay_hl
select stt, stt_rec into #o2 from #o1 where ngay_hl is null
update #d1 set stt = b.stt + cast(isnull(c.stt_rec0, 0) as int) from #d1 a left join (select c.stt - d.stt as stt, c.stt_rec, c.ngay_hl from #o1 c join #o2 d on c.stt_rec = d.stt_rec) b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl = b.ngay_hl left join #stt c on a.stt_rec = c.stt_rec
-- Insert @@inserting(insurance); end
-- Update if @type = '1' begin update hrttluong set @@list(master); from hrttluong a join #k b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec
update hrttctluong set @@list(detail); from hrttctluong a join #ct2 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.stt_rec0 = b.stt_rec0
update hrttctluongbh set @@list(insurance); from hrttctluongbh a join #d2 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.stt_rec0 = b.stt_rec0 end
